* **Finding / limitation**: Early evidence of decision value; pooling sensitive to outliers. * **Long‑term solution & goal**: Hierarchical pooling + diagnostics → robust field prescriptions. ## Key Result ### Main Figure ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} knitr::include_graphics(url_fig) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![Latest main figure from the repo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jaeseokh/value_multifield_ofpe/main/results/figures/main_figure.png) ::: ::: **Takeaway (2 sentences):** * The pooled model identifies consistent response patterns across fields. * Remaining variance suggests targeted pooling rules and outlier handling are pivotal. ### Main Table (top lines) ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(readr); library(dplyr) try({ tbl <- read_csv(url_tbl, show_col_types = FALSE) head(tbl, 8) }, silent = TRUE) ``` ::: **Takeaway (2 sentences):** * The summary highlights between‑field variability that affects expected gains. * We prioritize shrinkage strategies where uncertainty is largest. ## Workflow Roadmap
